title: Linear Equations Practice
description: Complete exercises 1-15 from chapter 4. Show all work and explain your reasoning for word problems.
subject: Mathematics

title: Essay: Industrial Revolution
description: Write a 500-word essay on the impact of the Industrial Revolution on modern society. Include at least 3 sources and proper citations.
subject: History

title: Lab Report: Chemical Reactions
description: Document your observations from today's chemistry lab. Include hypothesis, procedure, results, and conclusion.
subject: Chemistry

title: Reading Comprehension Quiz
description: Complete the online quiz based on chapters 7-9 of the assigned novel. Questions cover plot, character development, and themes.
subject: English Literature

title: Physics Problem Set
description: Solve problems 12-20 from the mechanics unit. Focus on force diagrams and Newton's laws applications.
subject: Physics
